English: I think I've got enough information.
German: Ich glaube, ich habe genug Informationen.

English: It's about time I headed to the booksto--
German: Ich sollte mich jetzt aufmachen zum Buchla–

English: Hey, what are you doing here?

Whoa! [p]?!
What the heck are you doing here?
Chinese:
咦？嗯？[p]！？
你怎麼會在這裡！？
German:
Was! [p]?!
Was zum Henker machst du denn hier?

English: Oh, you're investigating a case, huh?
Chinese: 啊、噢、你在調查事件啊……調查呀。
Korean: 아, 아아, 사건 조사인가… 조사 말이지
German: Ach, du gehst einem Fall nach, wie?

English: Hmph. What's the investigation? What's the case?
Chinese: 嗯……是在調查什麼呢？什麼樣的事件啊？
German: Hmpf. Was denn für ein Fall? Worum geht es?

English:
I can't say.
It's one of those confidential things.
Chinese:
我不能說……
我有保密義務。
Korean:
…말할 수 없습니다
비밀 의무라는 게 있어서요
German:
Darf ich nicht sagen.
Ist eine vertrauliche Angelegenheit.

English:
Whoa, why that attitude all of a sudden?!
I thought we were buds! Come on, spill the beans!
Chinese:
什麼！？少來這套！
我們什麼交情！說來聽聽會怎樣？
Korean:
하아!? 뭐야 새삼스레!?
나랑 댁의 사이잖아, 괜찮으니까 말하라구!
German:
He, was soll denn die kalte Schulter plötzlich?!
Ich dachte, wir sind Freunde! Na los, erzähl!

English:
The Akiba Disappearances? Yeah, I heard some folks
from this one forum went missing.
Chinese:
「秋葉原神秘失蹤事件」嗎……
對了，你說過這個廣場也有人失蹤。
Korean:
「아키바의 행방불명」인가… 그러고 보니, 이 포럼에서도
실종자가 나왔다고 했던가
German:
Vermisste von Akiba? Ja, ich habe gehört, dass
einige Leute aus einem Forum verschwunden sind.

English: And one of the members is the perpetrator?
Chinese: 所以犯人就在參加者之中囉……？
Korean: …그래서, 이곳의 참가자 중에 범인이 있다는 거야?
German: Und eins der Mitglieder ist der Täter?

English:
That sounds cool. I'll give you a hand.
I'm free right now.
Chinese:
嘿……好像很有趣嘛！
我也來幫忙吧，反正我現在挺閒的！
Korean:
헤에… 재밌을 것 같잖아
나도 도와줄게, 지금 좀 한가하기도 하고
German:
Klingt cool. Ich helfe dir.
Ich habe gerade Zeit.

English:
Let's go to Nakano, then. We're going to meet with
our informant there, right?
Chinese:
那我們去中野吧！
你不是和提供情報的人約在那裡嗎？
Korean:
그럼, 나카노로 가자고
정보 제공자와 만나기로 했잖아?
German:
Gehen wir also nach Nakano. Wir treffen unsere
Quelle dort, ja?

English: Was there something I needed to do here?
Chinese: 你問我不是有事才來這邊的嗎？
German: Ob ich hier etwas Bestimmtes vorhatte?

English:
Not particularly. It's not like that.
I just happened to be passing by is all.
Chinese:
也沒有啦……不是你說的那樣。
我只是剛好路過而已！剛好路過！
Korean:
별로… 딱히 그런 거 아니야
우연히 지나가다 들른 것 뿐이야, 우연히
German:
Nicht wirklich. Gar nicht.
Bin nur gerade vorbeigekommen.

English:
Is there something on your mind?
Like maybe, what's the Comimani forum?
Chinese:
我只是……有點好奇。
想知道漫畫狂熱……到底是什麼而已……
Korean:
뭔가, 신경 쓰였다고 할까?
코믹마니… 가 대체 뭘까, 같은?
German:
Beschäftigt dich etwas?
Zum Beispiel, was das Comimani-Forum ist?

English:
Like if it stands for something really out there,
like "Communist Manufacturing" or something?
Chinese:
如果是「虛擬實境狂熱主義」……之類的話，
那我可能會滿感興趣的……就這樣。
Korean:
커뮤니스트 매뉴팩처… 같은 거라면
좀 흥미가 있을지도, 같은?
German:
Ob es eine versteckte Bedeutung hat?
„Coder mit Manie“ oder so?

English: I'll go on ahead. Don't keep me waiting, okay?
Chinese: 好了，我先走了……你也快點過來！
Korean: 그럼, 나, 먼저 가 있을 테니까… 빨리 와라?
German: Ich gehe schon mal. Lass mich nicht warten, ja?
